Reviews.Title: Just amazing!
Reviews.Author: Mark Williams
Reviews.Content: I'm no professional, but this camera has almost everything a photo enthusiast needs to keep the shutter snapping! Small, sleek, and has the look of a higher end camera but without the price tag. It also has plenty of features to give the impression you shelled out the big bucks.The wi-fi connectivity makes sharing photos easier than ever, whether it be with your phone or tablet, e-mail, to your PC. Picture quality is superb for the type of camera, clear and full of color and detail. The pop-up flash is a great addition, keeping it safely out of the way when not in use. The hybrid touch screen makes controlling the settings as smooth as working a cell phone and the variety of shooting styles will keep anyone busy trying new techniques. One of my favorite features is the ability to connect the camera to my phone and use the phone as a controller, eliminating the need to set up the camera and run into the shot with a self timer. It is well worth the price, and if you get this bundle package, all the extras are very good quality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Wilson
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter and the photos she takes look like a professional photographer took the photos.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic pics!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Messel
Reviews.Content: My husband, our family photographer, likes it as we'll as our big camera. Our kids and extended family were able to easily put all the pictures they wanted from camera to mobile devices and computers.

Reviews.Title: Battery life too short & Wifi Network Functions are nonexistent
Reviews.Author: disappointed wifi person
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the wifi and touchscreen features.  Out of the box, the wireless functions don't work unless you install apps on your smartphone and your PC.  The apps were declared spyware by my antivirus and disabled.  I'm a computer tek by trade and have been setting up network printers for over 10 years.  You cannot set a manual ip address or transfer pictures to your computer wirelessly with the wifi.  The wifi function is useless on this camera because they didn't design the camera with an embedded web server interface or an ftp or telnet port.  I talked to their tek support and they said that there is no upgrade for the software and it is not open source so I cannot fix it myself. Touchscreen works fine, but I think the lcd draws too much off the battery.The battery capacity is too small for this camera.  It takes a long time to charge and goes dead in about 1/2 hour when in use.  I called samsungs tek support on this issue and they told me I broke the camera by leaving in on the charger all night... yeah right.  They sent me a replacement battery and the problem is still the same.  I went to a concert with a full charge on the battery and the battery went dead during the opening act from taking only 10 pictures with flash.  When the battery goes dead, the camera forgets the date and you have to reset it every time you use the camera (annoying).I've always loved samsung products and bought this one without reading any reviews,.. but for this product, their hardware and software development teams blew it on this one.  Wait for a real wifi camera or (p.s. mines forsale cause they wouldn't take it back at the walmart)

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: sherri garrett
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.  It is so nice.  Love how it connects to WiFi and you can send your pictures to anyone right as you take them!

Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Content: This product came as it was online so i would say i was good and i recommend it for other customers.

Reviews.Title: it is wonderful!!

Reviews.Content: very good :))))))))  i love it! cheap, cute! very good thank U!i only use it everyday! this is evidence that i love it!

Reviews.Title: corny
Reviews.Author: reynaldo delvalle
Reviews.Content: the camara haves issues with the memorycard I would not recommend and it gave me a lot of bad pictures as well I wasent happy with the product

Reviews.Title: I didnt liked it
Reviews.Author: Jawad Karim
Reviews.Content: i am not a pro photographer i used to have a canon and a Sony i was tempted by the technology of this one and also the price to be hinestthe good things about WB250F:the pack was OK delivery and everything, good looking, cheap, good zoom good picture quality outdoor nice technology.bad things about WB250F:the battery was already fully charged with a finger print on the lens ( i guess it is used) picture quality is not that good specially in dark areas, florescent, moving objects, WIFI is hard to set, not too many filters (like S3 or S4), made of cheap materials, i wish to return it back and get myself a real camera.

•14.2 megapixel resolution with high-quality still images and video recordings
•Samsung 4.0-72.0mm zoom lens with 18x optical zoom
•3.0" TFT LCD screen with image editing features
•The Samsung Smart Digital Camera with 18x Optical Zoom has a rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB200F/WB250F Smart Digital Camera 14.2 MP 18x Optical Zoom Wi-Fi, White + 8GB SDHC Class 10 Memory + Carrying Case + Mini Tripod Kit + USB SDHC Reader + Memory Wallet (White)
